name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As an Integrations Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a strong command of modern software development practices, including **Java**, **Kotlin**, and **Spring** for creating scalable backend solutions. My expertise extends to implementing **CI/CD** processes that enhance deployment efficiency and reduce time-to-market. I have hands-on experience with **React** for creating dynamic front-end applications and have utilized **Terraform** and **Helm** for infrastructure management. My proficiency in observability tools such as **Datadog**, along with deep understanding of REST, gRPC, and security standards including **OAuth2** and **mTLS**, ensures robust and secure integrations. 

I have a proven track record of developing high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, leveraging **microservices architecture** and **event-driven systems** to build resilient applications. Additionally, I excel in **caching** strategies, **rate limiting**, and **performance analysis**, guaranteeing optimal system performance. My capabilities in **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** facilitate seamless message-driven architectures, while I advocate for best practices in **secrets management** and **incremental rollouts**. My original strengths include a solid foundation in full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, as well as experience in developing enterprise-grade platforms integrating AI/ML capabilities.
